text: tree-root = node(77) fori E {2,...,N} do tree-root.add(7}) function add ( triangle ") if (f(a) < 0and f(b) < 0and f(c) < 0) then if (negative subtree is empty) then negative-subtree = node(T") else negative-subtree.add (T') else if (f(a) > 0and f(b) > 0 and f(c) > 0) then if positive subtree is empty then positive-subtree = node(7") else positive-subtree.add (T") else we have assumed this case is impossible
